title: Founding Researcher
description: Contributed to research on interpretable and responsible ML, implementing baseline models and reproducibility workflows. Co-authored a proposal that secured $2k in compute credits.

title: Core Organizer
description: Organized ML study sessions and hands-on workshops covering prompt engineering and API-based model integration. Coordinated internal hackathons and supported teams in shipping functional demos.

title: President
description: Led a student organization focused on product management interview prep, case practice, and peer mentoring. Grew APMC into a well-established campus organization.

title: Vice President
description: Led workshops introducing students to Adobe creative tools and portfolio workflows. Co-organized design challenges and cross-club creative events.
